description: Bridges: Type should be defined for param `idShipmentMethod` in method `Spryker\Zed\ShipmentCheckoutConnector\Dependency\Facade\ShipmentCheckoutConnectorToShipmentFacadeBridge::isShipmentMethodActive()`.
